page.title: 02SOUTHEND BRADFIELD
page.content: SOUTHEND LIES BETWEEN THE RIVERS PANG AND KENNET AND BETWEEN THE A4 TRUNK ROAD. IT IS AN AREA OF OUTSTANDING NATURAL BEAUTY WITH THE RIVERS AND TREES A SPECIAL FEATURE. THE VILLAGE WAS MENTIONED IN THE ORIGINAL DOMESDAY BOOK. SOME FAMILY HISTORIES CAN BE TRACED BACK TO PREVIOUS CENTURIES.THE CHRISTIAN FELLOWSHIP IS VERY STRONG IN SOUTHEND AND EACH SUNDAY THERE IS A TIME OF FAMILY WORSHIP. THERE ARE PRAYER GROUPS AND HOUSE MEETINGS FOR BIBLE STUDY. MANY ACTIVITIES TAKE PLACE IN THE VILLAGE HALL AND THERE ARE TENNIS COURTS,CHILDREN'S PLAYGROUND AND LARGE PLAYING FIELDS. THE SCHOOL IS CHURCH OF ENGLAND AIDED FOR BOYS AND GIRLS FROM 5-111 YRS. THERE ARE 101 CHILDREN ON ROLL.NEW HOUSES HAVE BEEN BUILT RECENTLY BUT ARE VERY EXPENSIVEÂ£100,000+.A THRIVING VILLAGE.
